title: BRIEF-Alamos Gold Reports Delay In Mining Concession Renewal For Kirazli Project
text:
BRIEF-Alamos Gold Reports Delay In Mining Concession Renewal For Kirazli Project

Stock Markets 22 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 07:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Alamos Gold Reports Delay In Mining Concession Renewal For Kirazli Project Oct 14 (Reuters) - Alamos Gold Inc : * ALAMOS GOLD REPORTS DELAY IN MINING CONCESSION RENEWAL FOR KIRAZLI PROJECT * ALAMOS GOLD - SUSPENDED ALL CONSTRUCTION ACTIVITIES ON ITS KIRAZLI PROJECT PENDING RENEWAL OF ITS TURKISH MINING CONCESSIONS WHICH EXPIRED ON OCT 13 * ALAMOS GOLD - GIVEN UNCERTAINTY AROUND CONCESSION RENEWAL TIMING, INITIAL PRODUCTION FROM KIRAZLI HAS BEEN DELAYED FROM PREVIOUS GUIDANCE OF LATE 2020

BRIEF-Alamos Gold Reports Delay In Mining Concession Renewal For Kirazli Project
description: BRIEF-Alamos Gold Reports Delay In Mining Concession Renewal For Kirazli Project
